name: Luminescence (itch)
description:
This game was made by 4 people in 48 hours(more like 38) at Viborg Game Jam 2019. The game is a prototype/proof of concept so it's full of bugs... 

Feedback is very much appreciated so go ahead and leave your thoughts!

Made by: 

  • Storm Soendergaard - Textures, 3D Art & Programming
  • Sebastian M. Falk - Programming
  • Anton M. Falk - 3D Art, 2D Art & Music/Sound
  • Andreas M. Kielsgaard - Programming
